page.title: 14LOCAL HISTORY
page.content: Ratho was a farming district. The word Ratho means low hills. The old spelling was Rathau. Some of the farmland is now replaced by new housing estates. The ld mansion houses are now used as golf courses. There are three golf courses.They are called Dalmahoy,Ingilston and Ratho Park. The old houses were made from uneven bricks from one of the quarries There were ten different quarriesin the late 19th century.Now there are only two working quarries.they are called Craig Park and Wimpy.The population after the war was about 700 it is now about 2,500.but the village hasnow grown because of the new housing estates. The oldest house is Ratho Park house (the golf course) st Marys roman catholic church was built in 1890
